item.title: Fixing crash when no name is inserted at login
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

What your adding:

If you do this tutorial your players wont crash if they accidently click on login without entering their usernames

In your client.java search this:

method84(String s, String s1, boolean flag) {U should see one or two line sbelow it try {, under try { add:

if(s == "" && s1 == "") { aString1266 = "@red@Your supposed to typ your username and"; aString1267 = "@red@password down there."; return; } if(s != "" && s1 == "") { aString1266 = "@red@Ur supposed to typ your password down there."; aString1267 = ""; return; } if(s == "" && s1 != "") { aString1266 = "@red@Ur supposed to typ your username down there."; aString1267 = ""; return; } if(s1 == "") { aString1266 = "@red@Ur supposed to typ your password down there."; aString1267 = ""; return; } if(s == "") { aString1266 = "@red@Ur supposed to typ your username down there."; aString1267 = ""; return; }If you want you could change the text it says.
Im Owner blade on the other cummunities
